---@class actor_enter_direction
local actor_enter_direction = {
    ---无方向（闪现）
    none = 0,
    ---从左侧入场
    from_left = 1,
    ---从右侧入场
    from_right = 2,
    ---从当前位置入场
    from_current = 3
}

return actor_enter_direction
